Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

Stormpath

public Stormpath()
initializes the stormpath api as well as the application, directory and groups that are needed. Uses a Constants class to determine where the apikey is. You need to create a class called Constants with a field called APIKEY_PATH which contains a path to your apiKey.properties

                          java.lang.String email,
                          java.lang.String group)
Description copied from interface: UserManagement
Creates an account

Specified by:
createAccount in interface UserManagement
Parameters:
givenName - The given name of the account holder
surname - The surname of the account holder
username - The username of the account holder (defaults to email if null)
password - The Password of the account
email - The email adress of the account holder, cannot be null
group - The authorization group that you want the account to belong to (can be null)
